instruction: Imagine you are the owner of a hotel. Describe your hotel and its amenities in a few sentences
output: Our family-owned hotel is located amid the lush greenery of central India and offers panoramic views of the countryside. Our spacious and comfortable rooms are fully equipped with modern amenities and provide a tranquil escape from everyday life. We also have a swimming pool, a gym, a terrace restaurant, and a spa to cater to the guests' leisure needs.
